```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
stringency_data <- read.csv('covid-stringency-index.csv')
all_data <- read.csv('owid-covid-data.csv')
```

```{r}
all_data %>%
  group_by(continent) %>%
  head()
```

```{r}
all_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=date,y=new_cases_smoothed, color=continent)) +
  geom_point()
```
